game.title: What games draw you in?
game.subtitle: Your gaming preferences reveal your learning style

sandbox.label: Sandbox Games
sandbox.description: Minecraft, Factorio, Kerbal Space Program - building and creating

strategy.label: Strategy Games
strategy.description: Civilization, XCOM, Stellaris - planning and managing

adventure.label: Adventure Games
adventure.description: Zelda, Mass Effect, Outer Wilds - exploring and discovering

esports.label: Competitive Games
esports.description: League of Legends, Valorant, Rocket League - competing and winning

domain.title: What future excites you?
domain.subtitle: Choose the industry that sparks your curiosity

space.label: Space & Aerospace
space.description: Satellites, rockets, exploration of the cosmos

focus.title: What do you want to understand?
focus.subtitle: How do you prefer to learn about technology?

how_works.label: How It Works
how_works.description: I want to understand the physics and systems

how_build.label: How to Build It
how_build.description: I want to learn how to create and manufacture

who_makes.label: Who Makes It
who_makes.description: I want to know about the people and companies

who_operates.label: Who Operates It
who_operates.description: I want to understand operations and deployment

BUILDER.name: The Builder
BUILDER.description: You learn by doing. Whether it's code, circuits, or spacecraft, you want to build it with your own hands. You thrive in sandbox environments where you can experiment and iterate.

STRATEGIST.name: The Strategist
STRATEGIST.description: You see the big picture. Complex systems, resource allocation, long-term planning - these excite you. You excel when you can think several moves ahead.

EXPLORER.name: The Explorer
EXPLORER.description: The unknown calls to you. Whether it's uncharted territory, new technologies, or untested ideas, you're driven by curiosity and the thrill of discovery.

COMPETITOR.name: The Competitor
COMPETITOR.description: You rise to competition. Benchmarks, leaderboards, and measurable goals drive you to be your best. You thrive under pressure and love to optimize.

quest2.title: The Epic Artifact
quest2.subtitle: Behold the technology that defines your future

assessment.title: Soft Skills Assessment
assessment.description: Discover your strengths through situational questions

quest7.title: Skill Forge
quest7.subtitle: Level up with curated learning paths

hackathons.empty: No hackathons available yet. Check back soon!

portfolio.title: Build Your Portfolio
portfolio.description: Upload projects, get peer reviews, and submit to hackathons to earn XP and showcase your skills.

1.title: The Awakening Begins
1.intro: Every legend starts with a single choice. Who will you become in the forge of tomorrow's technology?

2.title: Behold the Artifact
2.intro: Before you stands a marvel of human ingenuity. Let its power ignite your imagination...

3.title: Into the Deep
3.intro: Knowledge awaits those brave enough to seek it. Forge your understanding in the fires of learning...

4.title: Seek the Guilds
4.intro: Across the lands, great guilds await champions. Where will your journey take you?

5.title: The Hunt Begins
5.intro: The path to mastery reveals itself. What treasures await those who seek?

6.title: Wisdom of the Elders
6.intro: The greatest leaders share their secrets. Listen well, young champion...

7.title: The Forge Awaits
7.intro: Your skills are raw ore. The forge will temper them into legendary abilities...

8.title: Rise to the Hall
8.intro: You have proven worthy. Now join your fellow champions in the Guild Hall...

questComplete.1: Your identity is forged. The adventure begins!
questComplete.2: The artifact's secrets are revealed. Power awaits!
questComplete.5: The hunt reveals your path forward!
questComplete.6: The elders' wisdom strengthens your resolve!
questComplete.7: Your skills are tempered and ready!

how_works.rpgDesc: Master the physics and systems that power this technology...

how_build.rpgDesc: Learn the sacred arts of engineering and creation...

who_makes.rpgDesc: Discover the legendary companies and roles...

who_operates.rpgDesc: Master the arts of deployment and operations...

quiz.trialDesc: Test your understanding, apprentice. Answer wisely to earn XP.
quiz.incorrect: Not quite right. Study the explanation.

hub.title: Your Quest Journey
hub.subtitle: Continue your adventure through the 8 quests
hub.championMessage: You've completed all 8 quests. Your legend has been forged!
